job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: job title software engineerltbrgtlocation orlando flltbrgtduration monthsltbrgtltbrgtthe roleltbrgtwe are seeking software engineers in orlando as part of a core team developing directxdirectd drivers for desktoplaptop systems this team is essential to the success of as a growing company you will be working with the very best in our technology on some of the most exciting projects the industry has to offer including cloud gaming machine learning virtual reality ray tracing directd and new game titlesltbrgtltbrgtthe personltbrgtgood communication skills and an ability to communicate well with teams around the globeltbrgtability to work independently and as part of a teamltbrgtpassionate about learning good software engineering problem solving and new technologiesltbrgtltbrgtkey responsibilitiesltbrgtthe development debugging and performance tuning of graphics software running on microsoft windowsltbrgtcollaborating with asic design engineers and hardwaresoftware architects os engineers and peers in related development teamsltbrgtthe ability to debug low level hardware and operating system functionality is desiredltbrgtltbrgtpreferred experienceltbrgtexcellent cc programming skillsltbrgtexperience programming and optimizing gamesltbrgtknowledge of computer hardware architecture and organizationltbrgtexperience with virtualization technologiesltbrgtexperience with linux and windows osltbrgtd graphics api knowledge and experience dd or vulkanltbrgtd graphics driver knowledge and experienceltbrgtwindows development experienceltbrgtos and performance knowledge and experienceltbrgtexperience with multithreading and concurrent programmingltbrgtfamiliarity with performance analysis toolsltbrgtltbrgtacademic credentialsltbrgtbs degree ms or phd desiredltbrgt
